attributes.action: Make Face Masks/Visors compulsory at all times apart from eating in schools.
attributes.additional_details: Enforce rules that state that all students, teachers, caretakers, dinner ladies etc should always wear a mask or a face covering during school hours to prevent the spread of covid-19. This could save lives.
attributes.background: Make face masks or visors mandatory in secondary schools and colleges unless eating or specific person has a medical reason why they can’t wear a mask/visor

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Make wearing face masks mandatory in secondary schools and colleges.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330227

Mandatory for children aged 11 and above to wear face masks whilst at school.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331826
